newsitem.title: FRANCE: Eramet sees drop in 1996 results. [CORRECTED 17:00 GMT]
newsitem.headline: Eramet sees drop in 1996 results. [CORRECTED 17:00 GMT]

text.p: Nickel producer Eramet said it expected a 1996 net consolidated profit below the 357 million francs level of 1995.
It said in a statement that its cash flow should be slightly below the 686 million (corrects from "868 million") francs of 1995.
Full results will be published on April 23.
